adrFormatAddress: 233 W 111th St, New York, NY 10026, USA

originalText.text: Great experience, from start to finish. The quote was reasonable, the team was responsive to all my questions, and the movers themselves were punctual and efficient, while also being careful and considerate with my stuff. Would use Experia again!

text.text: Great experience, from start to finish. The quote was reasonable, the team was responsive to all my questions, and the movers themselves were punctual and efficient, while also being careful and considerate with my stuff. Would use Experia again!

originalText.text: So excited to have professional, reliable movers on speed dial! My  daughter needed a bed frame moved from midtown west to the East Village, it was hard finding movers to do a small moving job without a seperate truck rental charge. Most never responded. Nick and Rosie from Experia promptly responded to my inquiry, offered a great rate, and scheduled the move with ease. The day of the move the driver arrived early, picked up the bed frame, and I received a text message with a link allowing me to follow the truck during his journey using Mapquest. The arrangement was to drop the frame in her lobby, but the mover carried it up her 5 floor walk up and would not accept a tip! I wish she remembered his name, she said he was really nice. Our experience with Experia was top notch from the first contact to the drop off, with a very easy payment process. I would recommend Experia for any moving job. For my daughter's full apartment move later this year, she's already planning to use Experia. No need to research next time, we've got our movers on speed dial!

originalText.text: Move went really smooth, guys were really professional, didn't bother me at all and made my stressfull move actually really enjoyable. I would highly recommend them to anyone that wishes to have move as smooth as mine was. One word: Amazing!

text.text: Move went really smooth, guys were really professional, didn't bother me at all and made my stressfull move actually really enjoyable. I would highly recommend them to anyone that wishes to have move as smooth as mine was. One word: Amazing!

originalText.text: Nikol and his team did the most incredible move for us. All the walls and floors were protected professionally, and all we had to do was sit on the couch and drink coffee while they packed and moved our entire home. They are careful and understood all our instructions. Best moving experience I’ve ever had.

text.text: Nikol and his team did the most incredible move for us. All the walls and floors were protected professionally, and all we had to do was sit on the couch and drink coffee while they packed and moved our entire home. They are careful and understood all our instructions. Best moving experience I’ve ever had.

originalText.text:
What really stood out to me about Experia Moving Services was their attention to detail and willingness to go above and beyond for their customers. They were responsive to all of my questions and concerns, and I felt completely confident in their ability to handle my move from beginning to end.

Overall, I would highly recommend Experia Moving Services to anyone in need of a reliable and professional moving company. Their team is truly top-notch and they made my move a truly pleasant experience. Thank you, Experia Moving Services!
